resources.string:
"Welcome to WordFlip!.

"
"Trace together letters from the game board to form words! " "How many can you find in 3 minutes?

" "Allowed Words: " "Any word in the standard english dictionary 3 or more letters long." "Proper nouns are not allowed. Words must be formed by letter-tiles that are " "adjacent by a side or diagonal. A " "letter-tile may only be used once per word.

"

"Scoring: 
" "Letters: 3-4 5 6 7 8+
" "Points: 1 1 2 3 5 11
" "In multiplayer mode, any words you both found will be cancelled out,"\ "so remember that unique words are more valuable than common ones!" "

--------
" "Notes for 412 peeps: " "Game does not currently enforce tile adjacentcy rule." "I'm especially interested in any feedback on artwork and sound-effects"
